concept.title: Production notes (distributing)
concept.shortdesc: Production notes for the distributing your published content section of this document.

prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

section.title: Would users benefit by subscribing to updates to documents like this one?
section.p: We have thought of using RSS to notify interested users about updates to this document. Would you be interested?
Would your users be interested in taking advantage of that capability for DITA documents you publish?
